channel.title: David Bonan | Blog
channel.description: David Bonan - Senior developer, entrepreneur, and general technology enthusiast

item.title: AI-Assisted Legacy Migration: Lessons Learned
item.description: A retrospective on using AI tools intensively for a large codebase migration, from initial failures to a workflow that actually works.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Boosting Performance with Web Workers
item.description: Learn how to leverage Web Workers to run CPU-intensive tasks without blocking the main thread in JavaScript applications.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Building a Mobile App with AI: A Journey from Concept to App Store
item.description: A real-world experience of using AI tools like Cursor and Claude to build a mobile application from scratch, highlighting both benefits and challenges.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Claude Code vs Cursor: A Monorepo Showdown
item.description: A real-world comparison of Claude Code and Cursor when building complex features in a large monorepo, exploring their strengths and limitations.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Debugging Slow SQL Server Queries: A Developer's Practical Guide
item.description: Learn how to systematically identify and optimize slow SQL Server queries using execution plans, profiling tools, and proven techniques.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Effective Code Reviews: Beyond Nitpicking
item.description: Transform your code review process from a bottleneck into a valuable team practice that improves code quality and knowledge sharing.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Leveraging TypeScript Advanced Types: Practical Uses Beyond Basics
item.description: How to use TypeScript's advanced type features to solve real-world problems and create more maintainable codebases.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Mastering JavaScript Data Structures: Beyond Arrays
item.description: Learn how choosing the right data structure in JavaScript can significantly improve your code performance and readability.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Optimizing React Performance: A Practical Guide
item.description: Learn practical techniques to identify and fix performance bottlenecks in your React applications.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Solving N² Complexity with JavaScript Maps
item.description: Learn how to transform inefficient nested loops into performant solutions using JavaScript Maps.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Why Unit Tests Can Harm Your Codebase and Prevent Refactoring
item.description: Learn why over-testing intermediate methods can lead to rigid code and how to make better decisions about what to test.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)

item.title: Migration Legacy Assistée par IA : Retour d'expérience
item.description: Une rétrospective de l'utilisation intensive des outils IA pour une migration d'une large codebase, des échecs initiaux à un workflow qui fonctionne réellement.
item.author: contact@davidbonan.com (David Bonan)
